title: Prepare to Test: Draft Pick Normals

replies.body: It would be nice if I could log in, I tried to contact someone but no reply.. RIP

Somewhat related to the new draft pick, in the pre-q lobbies, if you turned off music and sound effects, you could hear the night time sounds of birds and crickets and the wind. I loved that. It is now only available to hear if you turn on the music and can only sort of hear it in the background. I wish there was an option or something to turn that on and off like there is with music and sound effect. A small thing, but it made queues more enjoyable for me :)
The calm before the storm. I'll look into this.
I'm testing the alpha client now AND YOU GUYS PUT THE SOUNDS THERE omg this makes me so happy i cant even explain it makes queues so pleasant now like they used to be THANK YOU SO MUCH  !!
pls doom bots {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

So far the draft pick is pretty good, but here is a list of issues that I currently have with it.

**MAJOR ISSUES**
1. When on an enemy's turn, the champion hover does not appear on the right side nor in the center.
2. Champion splash occasionally does not sync up with what the summoner is actually picking (eg. Summoner hovers Ahri and then Veigar, but stays on the Ahri splash)
3. FPS Spikes are everywhere.

**Minor Issues (Mainly aesthetic)**
1. Primary and secondary icons do not have the same look to match the Hextech feel that the client is going for and is downright ugly when seen on the banner ( Sorry design team :[ )
2. Lack of pick quotes as well as the lock in sound effect for other players. It's very quiet and when not focusing on the client, it's hard to tell who is picking.
3. Stock image of SR sketch at the start of the draft. Could use something else, but hey it's the alpha

Guess I'm not the only one that has a problem with regards to lag in my laptop, got an i7 on it and it lags as hell.

As for the champion select, I'll add also the voice for who team is banning or picking, and add the option to change your load out while waiting for the picks to be finish. I tried to access my skins while waiting for the picks to be finished but I cannot access it for some reason but it is minor anyways.

Overall, good work on the draft mode, just need to work on some issues especially with lagging on high end laptops (such as mine).

PS
Can anyone tell me when Ranked Draft will be release? Just new to the alpha client process.

Regarding skin selection, current flow is that players wait for everyone to lock in before selecting skins. This is currently by design. Having said that we're looking into ways to make this smoother and allow more time to select your skin during champ select.
When they add it to the PBE build (it hasn't been added yet), then if they don't disable it, it should ship with the next patch... They seem to release changelogs the day after patch days.

I see, I'll be looking forward it in the next changelog since I extensively work on SR and ARAM modes and I do enjoy the client and working on it.

Thanks for the info{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I got you back mate! It seems i experienced not the only one! Video below show the hella lag on my i7 pc :D

I don't see an option to give feedback on the give feedback area yet, but I'm noticing very laggy transitions through the entire drafting phase. Whenever a champ is picked, banned, or any other sort of transition is painful. Especially with sound on. If I had a lower quality computer I couldn't imagine how awful it would feel to use this champ select.
YES im not the only one!! I got a video mate i recorded it.. Scroll down here a bit

Thanks for your feedback. Champ select experience on draft normals is especially janky right now but we wanted to get this out to you guys so we could get more eyes on it as we continue to make performance improvements in the upcoming patches. It's especially painful right now on lower end machines.
Thanks! I hope my video contains enough information. :)
Like... when is it up tho...? server status on LCUA been offline since this morning...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Sorry for the downtime folks, the alpha is back up now with draft pick normals.
The Alpha on EUW is still down, though.
Notice he said that on the NA forum. I know, crazy.

Poking some guys who can potentially give information or do something about it, is not a strange option. This forum is way more active than the EUW at these times and that's why I chose to post it here.

Anyway, it's up on EUW too now, so thanks if you resolved that! Will be giving feedback asap. ^_^

Can I have the option to disable the animations, I'm running on a lower end machine and the animations cause noticeable lag.

Also, after locking in a champion, I'd like to be able to still see my champion list so I can see who I have and can trade with whoever I am with, granted I have every champion on my main account, but many people do not so it would be a nice feature to have.

They want to build the client now and when it fully releases they will make this an option to differentiate high and low intense animations. Just wait for it. It will happen like the yorick rework you'll just have to wait.

Big Issues with .08!
I cant see  my champs to select them in Champ Select this bug has happened three times 2x in 5v5 Draft and Once in 3v3. Since .08 I have let to get a game to work in the Alpha client and get queue dodges because I cant see the champs to select them. I have submitted this bug report. Also I cant see my runes either just the stats. Is there a graphic layer missing in some sections? This seems like that type of bug. Below is a video of the Rune issue.. And Also pics of the champ select issues. I will take a video if it happens again of that too.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32017643/League_Champ_Select_Failure.png
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32017643/Champ_Select_Fail_3v3.png
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32017643/Rune_Page_No_Images.MP4
This is a pretty nasty bug that we're prioritizing to fix sooner than later. Thanks for submitting that bug report!
